data.content_en: You make millions of decisions that mean nothing and then one day your order takes out and it changes your life.
data.content_zh: 你每天都在做很多看起来毫无意义的决定，但某天你的某个决定就能改变你的一生。

data.content_en: Destiny is something we’ve invented because we can’t stand the fact that happens is accidental.
data.content_zh: 所谓命运不过是托辞，因为我们无法忍受所有事情的发生都是偶然的这样的事实。

data.content_en: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
data.content_zh: 昨天是历史，明天是谜团。但今天是礼物，那就是为什么它被称为present（礼物）。
